About the Evalutation Version

In order to use the Qt Jambi Evaluation version, you need the evaluation key, which is sent by email when you register to evaluate Qt Jambi. If you have not received an eveluation key, please contact sales@trolltech.com.

The key is entered in the installer on Windows. On Mac OS X and Linux, it is entered by running the binpatch application, which is located in the Qt Jambi installation directory.

A general Qt Jambi readme is available in the installation directory: readme.html.

For running Qt Jambi applications, please refer to the "Alternate way of loading native libraries", in the installation document.
